metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6872 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: The elf_parse_notes function in elf.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.30, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and segmentation violation) via a note with a large alignment.

notes.Note: ratliff> without ASAN, does not segfault on trusty nor xenial mdeslaur> code is different in xenial, needs backport

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
